summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 8, 2019. It documents routine institutional operations, staff leave, and inmate statuses. The most significant entry is the placement of inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) on Psychological Observation (Psych Obs) during the evening watch shift.

events.title: Epstein Placed on Psychological Observation
events.description: During the evening watch shift, inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was placed on Psychological Observation (Psych Obs).

events.title: Fire Suppression System Inoperative
events.description: During the day watch shift, the fire suppression system was reported as inoperative, requiring the initiation of a Fire Watch.

events.title: Staff Shortage Affects Posts
events.description: Due to a shortage of staff, the correctional assignments for Phone Monitor, Sally Officer #3, and 10-South #2 were vacated during both the day and evening watch shifts.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was placed on Psychological Observation (Psych Obs) during the evening watch shift on July 8, 2019.
The report documents a routine day at MCC New York with 790 total inmates at the beginning of the morning watch on July 8, 2019.
A fire suppression system was inoperative, requiring a Fire Watch, and staff shortages led to several posts being vacated.
Multiple other inmates were admitted to, released from, or placed in special housing at the facility on this date.
The document is a standard institutional daily activity report created on July 9, 2019, summarizing the previous day's events.
